name: Dragongate visual novel
description:
A town in a pocket dimension created to hide and protect people escaping from a merciless otherworldly  enemy. Having lost contact  with the outside, the people have no choice but to live as best they can, until rumors that the enemy has found them surface.

Join Oliver, a young bat and refugee and his friends as they face an inexplicable enemy and uncover the mystery of the towns original purpose.
